item.title: ICSM Water Polo hit the streets (and pools) of Lisbon
item.author: Rebecca Ward,
item.description: On Friday 19th January 42 members of ICSM Water Polo met at West Brompton Station giddy with excitement for our 2018 international tour to Lisbon. The journey to Lisbon was long, and not without hiccups, but eventually we found ourselves in our natural habitat – poolside, ready to face what Lisbon’s …
